>"That part's simple -- we have an artificial limit imposed once the scenario
>hits a certain number of characters, at which point those types of things
>(generators, slimes, etc.) will stop creating new units."
>
>One thing i've noticed about that is that once that they've stopped, they
>have a tendancy not to start going again. or am i just imagining things?

It may wait until the blood-splots for the slain characters have vanished, 
which can take a while (yet *another* thing dependent on the game 
mechanics, I know) :-)

Anyway, I haven't checked that part of the code recently, I'm just going 
from memory, so the real answer is "I'm not sure." :)

--Tom
